channel.title: Source/Client?
channel.description:
is this from my source (Delta) or Client (i think Blurrr) but when someone drops or a monster drops some items theres 2 "."s theres intsted of pickup [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6453/pickupi.png[/img]
i was wondering if there was a way to fix that

item.title: Source/Client?
item.dc:creator: @owz owz
item.description:
@owz wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:4, topic:276772”]Go in to class 8 of your client and click edit. You should see something like this

if(i == 8765) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14125; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14123;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14123;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Ringmasters Hat";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Wow fancy hat.".getBytes();//examin info }

What you do is put these

class8.aString170 = "Ringmasters Hat";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Wow fancy hat.".getBytes();//examin info

Under this

class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option

didnt work plus some of my items where already like that and there still get the … thing

Read full topic

item.title: Source/Client?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Go in to class 8 of your client and click edit. You should see something like this

if(i == 8765) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14125; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14123;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14123;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Ringmasters Hat";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Wow fancy hat.".getBytes();//examin info }

What you do is put these

class8.aString170 = "Ringmasters Hat";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Wow fancy hat.".getBytes();//examin info

Under this

class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option

Read full topic
